verses.text: Only one step to Jesus from the dark-ness in-to light; Only one step to Jesus from the wrong un-to the right; Only one step to Jesus, from death in-to life; Only one step to Jesus from the storm un-to the light.

Only one step from sad-ness, from guilt with all its dread; Only one step from mad-ness, from Self unto its head; Only one step from anguish, from pain un-to the light; Only one step to flourish, On - ly one step to light.

refrain.text: Only one step, only one step; That is not far to go: Only one step, only one step, From Jesus we may know Why not take it now?
